item.title: Haiti Cholera Health Sites
item.description: Accessibility of Health Sites in Artibonite, Haiti

item.title: Hurricane Risk
item.description: This project, produced out of an Advanced Vector class, examined how to quantify Hurricane Risk by county for Florida (as well as surrounding counties). Using Historical Hurricane data from NOAA, and Social Vulnerability data from the CDC, we mapped Exposure to hurricanes, Average Intensity of Hurricanes, and Vulnearbility. These were aggregated into a final, Hurricane Risk Index, or HRI.

item.title: Massachusetts Forest Cover
item.description: Forest Cover Change in Massachusetts for 2015

item.title: Mexico Land Change
item.description: Land Cover Transition Potentials in Mexico for 2030 This project created maps of the lands potential to transtion from Forest, Grassland, and Shrubland to Agrigriculre or Settlement. We used ESA CCI Land Cover Data, reclassified into 7 catagories, and TerrSett’s Land Change Modeler tool. Land Cover in 2015 2030 Transition Potential Predicted 2030 Land Cover
